articles.title: Just a Fainting Spell? Or is Betelgeuse About to Blow?
articles.description: A familiar star in the constellation Orion has dimmed noticeably since October. Astronomers wonder if its explosive finale is imminent.
articles.content:
Is Betelgeuse about to blow?
Probably not, but astronomers are having fun thinking about it.
